subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : one is labelled as Assertion A and the other is labelled as Reason R : Reason R : Phenols react with halogen acids violently. In the light of the above statements, choose the most appropriate from the options given below: explanation of A explanation of A

options.text: (1) Both A and R are true but R is NOT the correct
(2) A is false but R is true
(3) A is true but R is false
(4) Both A and R are true and R is the correct
Assertion A : Aryl halides cannot be prepared by replacement of hydroxyl group of phenol by halogen atom.
